synopsis.text:
Drowning in the monotony of being the world's greatest assassin, Lugh Tuatha DÃ© met an untimely end at the hands of his employer. In a twist of fate, a goddess reincarnates him into a realm brimming with magic and swordplay, tasking him with preventing the impending doom brought about by a formidable hero. Reborn as the heir to a prestigious assassin family in the Alvan Kingdom, Lugh combines his modern-day expertise with the arcane techniques of his new world, setting his sights on becoming the ultimate killer.

As Lugh hones his skills under his father's tutelage, he discovers newfound talents and forges alliances with intriguing individuals. However, the constant attention from captivating women threatens to distract him from his mission. With the future of this enchanting world hanging in the balance, will Lugh's unparalleled assassination prowess be enough to vanquish the hero and secure his own destiny?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
